name: Firefox theme: Denebola [Fx 29+/Linux]
description: A glossy, glassy Firefox theme with full support for lightweight themes/Personas. Now with color customization. Updated from style 41237 and style 44322 for Firefox 29 and above. Linux only; untested on Windows and macOS/OS X.
additional_info:
Release history:

2016/08/14:
* Initial release.

5.0.1:
* Fixed bottom border in browser window.

5.0.2:
* Menus in menubar restyled to look slightly less bad when mouse hovers over them.

5.0.3:
* Custom styling in navigator toolbox deleted for add-ons manager tab.

5.0.4:
* Changed color from PaleVioletRed to Plum.

5.0.5:
* Color is now an option. Fixed weird gradient in the tabs toolbar.
